Solid game, I would go as far as to say a classic. It does the Counter-Strike brand/franchise proud. In my experience, Counter Strike 1.6 and soon after, Source was really the first iteration of a truly polished, competitive, and era appropriate Tactical FPS. As graphics and expectations increased, CS:GO came in to take the game to the next level. Compounding it and it's predecessors into the timeless classic that it has become. If computer gaming and Tactical shooters persist 100's of years into the future, this game and it's other previous iterations should go down as the "OG's" or forefathers of the genre. Unfortunately a lot of hackers in the game nowadays.
